sqlQuery.name: ByNameList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, ($$group_names$$) ds WHERE lower(og.name) = lower(ds.group_name) and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R') UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, ($$group_names$$) ds WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(ds.group_name)

sqlQuery.name: ByAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.name LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R') UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND ref.primary_identifier LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE (sa.source_id LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') OR sa.full_id LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%'))

sqlQuery.name: ByPfamIdOrKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment WHERE group_name is not null AND (accession LIKE UPPER(REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) OR symbol LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%') OR description LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%'))

sqlQuery.name: ByKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = asi.aa_sequence_id AND asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, $$keyword$$, '')>0

sqlQuery.name: BySequenceCount
sqlQuery.sql: WITH core AS (SELECT og.name, og.number_of_members as core_num FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE core_peripheral_residual = 'C' UNION SELECT og.name, 0 as core_num FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE core_peripheral_residual = 'R' ), peripheral AS (SELECT og.name, og.number_of_members as peripheral_num FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE core_peripheral_residual = 'P' UNION SELECT og.name, og.number_of_members as peripheral_num FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE core_peripheral_residual = 'R' ) SELECT c.name as group_name FROM core c, peripheral p WHERE c.name = p.name AND c.core_num>=$$core_count_min$$ AND c.core_num<=$$core_count_max$$ AND (p.peripheral_num-c.core_num)>=$$peripheral_count_min$$ AND (p.peripheral_num-c.core_num)<=$$peripheral_count_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByGenomeCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT group_name, core_count, peripheral_count FROM ( SELECT DECODE(c.group_name,NULL,p.group_name,c.group_name) as group_name, DECODE(c.core_count,NULL,0,c.core_count) as core_count, DECODE(p.peripheral_count,NULL,0,p.peripheral_count) as peripheral_count FROM (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct taxon_abbreviation) AS core_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral='C' GROUP BY group_name) c FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct taxon_abbreviation) AS peripheral_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral='P' GROUP BY group_name) p ON c.group_name = p.group_name ) WHERE core_count>=$$core_taxon_min$$ AND core_count<=$$core_taxon_max$$ AND peripheral_count>=$$peripheral_taxon_min$$ AND peripheral_count<=$$peripheral_taxon_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByAvgHomology
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE DECODE(avg_connectivity,NULL,0,100*avg_connectivity/(number_of_members-1)) BETWEEN $$percent_min$$ AND $$percent_max$$ AND core_peripheral_residual in ('C','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentMatchPairs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name as group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE percent_match_pairs between $$percent_min$$ AND $$percent_max$$ and core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentIdentity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_percent_identity >= $$percent_min$$ AND og.avg_percent_identity <= $$percent_max$$ and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentMatch
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_percent_match >= $$percent_min$$ AND og.avg_percent_match <= $$percent_max$$ and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByEValue
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_evalue_exp >= $$evalue_min$$ AND og.avg_evalue_exp <= $$evalue_max$$ and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPhyleticPattern
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, ($$phyletic_expression$$) ex WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ex.ortholog_group_id and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByEcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sa.group_name from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec where ( ec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_number_type_ahead$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') OR ec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_wildcard$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') OR ec.description LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_wildcard$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') ) and asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id and sa.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: FromSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.group_name, sum(answer.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, ($$sequence_answer$$) answer WHERE sa.full_id = answer.full_id GROUP BY sa.group_name

sqlQuery.name: AllGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R')
